title: Can anyone explain what actually is being played on the 29th of August?

embed.description: Head to head match information and times scheduled for this week's Pro League of Legends Esports Matches.

body:
My friend and I have been wanting to go watch LCS and we noticed they were selling tickets for the 29th through the 31st. Finals are this weekend in NYC so I was wondering if anyone knew exactly what was going on on the 29th?
Thanks!!

replies.body: That's the Regional Qualifiers, aka The Gauntlet.  The 3rd-6th place teams (by 2015 Championship Points) will fight it out for the 3rd and final spot at Worlds!

> [{quoted}](name=Tiza,realm=NA,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=E1xHAufM,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-08-19T21:33:57.206+0000)
>
> That's the Regional Qualifiers, aka The Gauntlet.  The 3rd-6th place teams (by 2015 Championship Points) will fight it out for the 3rd and final spot at Worlds!

Thank you so much! My date is going to be awesome now!
